content.query:
SELECT TOP 3
    [year]
    ,subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/nonPartitionedParquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [year] = '2001'
GROUP BY subcategory, [year]
ORDER BY num DESC
